# Using https://extgit.iaik.tugraz.at/krypto/hadeshash/blob/master/code/scripts/calc_round_numbers.py
# python calc_round_numbers.py 1024 4 128 1 1 > ~/filecoin-project/neptune/parameters/round_numbers-1024-4-128-1-1.txt
# Text below this line is output.
N: 1024
Security level M: 128
Field: Prime
S-box: f(x) = x^5
[8, 56, 88, 22528]
Recommendation for N=1024, t=4:
R_F = 8
R_P = 56
S-box cost = 88
Size cost = 22528

Format: [Security Level, Field Size, # Elements, Field, S-Box, R_F, R_P]
